attributes.action: Stop standing charged on gas,  electric and water bills
attributes.additional_details:
Gas and electric company standard charged have increased which has nothing to do with cost of wholesale energy, they no longer have meter reading people.
Water: 5 Olympic pools water lost daily
Water company's charge 2 parts of a standard charge for each toilet flush 
Example 
I have been charged £3.07 for water I used 
My bill £28.38 for 65 days 
Each toilet flush : charge for water, charge for sewage, part standard charge for water used and part standard charge for sewage
attributes.background: Stop company's making extra profit via daily standing charges
